name: es2017-lambda-boilerplate
description: An ES2017 boilerplate for AWS Lambda (Node.js 6.10)

scripts.build: npm run build:init && npm run build:js && npm run build:install
scripts.build:install: cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:pack
scripts.spec: npm run spec:snapshot && npm run spec:functional
scripts.test: npm run test:build && npm run test:run
scripts.test:build: npm run test:build:init && npm run test:build:js && npm run test:build:install
scripts.test:build:install: cp package.json test/dist/ && cd test/dist && npm install --production
